cost.question: How much does registration cost?
cost.answer: Registration is completely free. You only pay a commission on sales made (between 5% and 15% depending on the product category).

payment.question: How do I get paid?
payment.answer: You receive your payments by bank transfer or Mobile Money (Orange Money, MTN MoMo, Wave) according to your preference, usually within 7 days after confirmed delivery.

delivery.question: Who handles delivery?
delivery.answer: You can choose to handle delivery yourself or use our logistics partners. We offer preferential rates with DHL, La Poste and local carriers.
